data.eml:eml: The Doryctinae (Braconidae) of Costa Rica: genera and species of the tribe Heterospilini

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marsh, Paul M., Wild, Alexander L., Whitfield, James B. (2013): The Doryctinae (Braconidae) of Costa Rica: genera and species of the tribe Heterospilini. ZooKeys 347: 1-474, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.347.6002, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.347.6002
